about.text: I started my journey 6 years ago as the Founder and Creative Director of Kollab - a streetwear brand. The love for building aesthetically pleasing products led me to the digital world. Today, I'm a Certified AWS Developer Associate, Solutions Architect Associate and a Meta Certified Front-End Developer.
